body_html: I'm down, though I wasn't aware of the LR scheduler API so I'll need to dig into that and learn it before I can contribute. I personally have seen more uses of SGDR style learning rates than cyclic learning rates (the only two cites on the CLR paper are self-cites) but I don't think either should be too tough to throw together.

body: I'm down, though I wasn't aware of the LR scheduler API so I'll need to dig into that and learn it before I can contribute. I personally have seen more uses of [SGDR](https://arxiv.org/abs/1608.03983) style learning rates than cyclic learning rates (the only two cites on the CLR paper are self-cites) but I don't think either should be too tough to throw together.
